entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB4096: "StaticWebAsset" does not define a value for metadata "AssetKind" #73542
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBufferAndPingOptions #73541
  • Cache most popular string objects in String.InternalSubString #73540
    8.0.0
  • Mono crashes test runs #73539
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.JsonArrayTests.HeterogeneousArray - asserts #73538
  • Sockets tests SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose and AcceptGetsCanceledByDispose - throw NotSupportedException - on AppleTV/iOS #73536
  • Test failure: ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding - NotSupportedException : Memory stream is not expandable #73534
  • Cannot Publish when Referencing other EXE Projects #73531
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Random test failure due to a possible race in startup #73528
    7.0.0
  • Wrong computed RID on Alpine Linux alpha / beta releases #73525

Closed

  • Assert.Null failed for mono in System.Reflection.Emit.Tests #72858
    8.0.0
  • The build step which produces the apt linux packages is running on EOL distro version. #1252
    7.0.0
  • Support for [LibraryImport] on local functions #73532
  • [wasm] Check if `python` is installed when installing the workload #54638
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • shortcut string replace if oldvalue is longer than count #73543
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock fix #73537
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement initial capacity for AsnWriter #73535
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Improve IndexOf(char, OrdinalIgnoreCase) #73533
    area-System.Runtime
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAot] Try re-enabling S.C.Concurrent tests #73526
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some racy tests #73524
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Undefined behavior with null #73507
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Describe PGO kind in JitDisasm #73529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix Assert.Null failed for Mono in System.Reflection.Emit #73504
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int. #73511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various fixes for generation aware analysis #70764
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add null checks in various XML methods #73243
    area-System.Xml
  • [mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #73480
    area-GC-mono
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept<T>(T value) #73488
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add custom JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #73448
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Use DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts to configure Diagnostic Server #73370
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock CI test #73519
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Access the User-Agent for CONNECT tunnels early #73331
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
